subject: SSN4741
description_text:
Hello,

Just to make sure - this order includes express shipping and still has not
been sent. Is this okay? In my opinion we are running of time.

Kind regards,
Robert Olszewski

conversations.body_text: Hi mBoBBy,    We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. As the item is currently out of stock at our German warehouse, we shall arrange an urgent dispatch via UPS for you. Delivery is expected to arrive on the 20th.

Thank you for fast reply and your help on this,

Have a good day,
Robert
